content: Teach those Segway geeks a thing or two about advanced transportation efficiency by rolling up on the self balancing unicycle. This eco-friendly gadget whizzes around at speeds up to 10 MPH and features regenerative brakes for added safety.

Tear up the streets of your town like Springfield’s best street skater with the Bart Simpson skateboard. For the first time ever you’ll be able to shred using Bart’s signature skateboard, complete with a spray painted logo, pink 60mm wheels, and bright blue trucks.

Drunk dialing and texting may be fun but they pail in comparison to drunk coloring. Within the pages of the drinking and drawing coloring book you’ll find a multitude of activities that’ll entertain you while putting your uncoordinated motor skills to the test.

titleEN: Guardians Of The Galaxy Groot Mask
content: Dress up like the coolest hero you probably never knew existed prior to 2014 with the Guardians of the Galaxy Groot mask. This officially licensed mask is decorated to give off a realistic appearance that will far exceed the sea of homemade Groot costumes this Halloween.

Give your home a cheerful holiday glow year-round with the LED string lights. The durable opaque material these lights are made of create a warm, soft glow and allow you to choose from multiple light settings so you can create the perfect mood for any evening.

titleEN: A Practical Guide To Racism Book
content: Learn the proud history of racial profiling and become a knowledgeable new age bigot by reading A Practical Guide to Racism. This provocative read breaks down common stereotypes and examines minorities in detail so you can better understand our multicultural world.

titleEN: The Night Dad Went To Jail Book
content: Help little Timmy understand the concept of doing hard time by reading him “The Night Dad Went To Jail”. This informative children’s book will teach kids the life changes they can expect after daddy gets sent off to federal pound me in the ass prison.

Send a special message when the time strikes with this hidden message pinch shirt. When you feel the urge to tell someone to get lost, simply pinch the shirt at the indicated points and the jumbled message transforms into a big “FUCK OFF”!

Give your school supplies a nostalgic touch with the Pac-Man pencil top erasers. The pencil tops make awesome props for entertaining yourself during class and even better erasers to correct the mistakes you made while playing with these erasers at your desk.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Pool Table Kit
content: Place a new spin on the classic game of billiards by transforming your table using the glow in the dark pool table kit. The kit features a set of specially made balls that react under UV lighting, allowing you to experience the game in a brand new light.

The collapsible bucket is the last bucket you’ll ever have to buy. This versatile bucket is made from durable silicone and features an innovative design that allows you to adjust the height to four different levels so you find the right fit for the job at hand.

90s kids rejoice – SURGE cola is back by popular demand! This cavity spawning citrus flavored liquid adrenaline will provide you with a nostalgic kick in the mouth, and is available for purchase for a limited time online! Feed the rush!

Turn yourself into a human torpedo as you barrel down the turbo chute water slide. This enormously long water slide can be set up anywhere and features an extra slippery coating on the surface to improve your speed as you make your way to the water.

Assemble your very own team of Avengers by whipping up a batch of treats using the Marvel cake molds. Shaped like your favorite heroes from the Marvel universe, they’re fun to use and help you create professional looking treats with remarkable ease.

Give your laptop an eye-catching makeover by rolling out the MacBook rainbow keyboard cover. Each key is individually molded and printed on an extra slim silicone skin designed to provide full protection against dust and spills.

Maximize the effectiveness of your cardio workout by exercising on the aquatic treadmill. The treadmill helps you stay cool as you work up a sweat, while providing a low impact workout that engages the entire body so you can burn more calories in less time.

Use your Jedi training to help you find things in the dark by wielding the lightsaber keychain flashlight. Shaped like the iconic weapon of choice from Star Wars, this tiny replica is durable and features a surprisingly bright LED light available in all the classic colors.

Take all the hard work out of opening corked bottles by using the electric corkscrew. With the push of a button, the corkscrew begins pulling quickly and efficiently, opening up your favorite bottles of precious fermented grape juice regardless of the type of cork.

Relive your glorious arcade days from the comfort of home with the iPad arcade cabinet. This mini cabinet features a cool retro design and includes everything you need to game like in the old days such as a joystick, two red buttons, and a slot to insert quarters.

Transform your pool into an aquatic b-ball court with the pool arcade basketball. The inflatable hoop sets up in mere minutes and features a colorful backboard and side walls to prevent the shots from flying away as you try to outscore your opponent.

Pucker up and impress everyone at the club with this eye-catching glow in the dark lipstick. This unique shade is specially formulated to react under UV lights so that it transforms from a bright fuchsia into a hot neon pink when you’re out partying.

Learn the building blocks of how to sculpt the body of your dreams by following the tips found in the Strength Training Beginner’s book. This top ranked fitness book instructs you on the do’s and don’ts of weightlifting so you can maximize workouts and get results faster.

Revive your phone when there’s no electricity in sight using the rugged solar panel charger. After 7 hours under direct sunlight it’s capable of charging your phone up to 60% power so that you can utilize it in case of an emergency while in the great outdoors.

Give your kitty a panoramic view of his domain as he rests comfortably on the cat window perch. This portable and Humane Society approved perch provides a secluded, safe, and cozy space for your feline friend to relax in.

Create professional looking treats for any event in the comfort of your own kitchen with these cake pop molds. These compact ball shaped molds require absolutely no baking and create delicious cake pops you can decorate and sprinkle with your favorite toppings.

Cool off like never before as you unwind inside the inflatable spring float. This giant float sprawls across the water’s surface to provide you with a unique and entertaining way to lounge poolside as you lie inside the ginormous spring.

Gorge yourself on mouth-watering sliders whenever the craving strikes using the mini burger machine. The die-cast aluminum plates are specially designed to make six perfectly shaped sliders you can customize with your favorite toppings.

Add a geeky touch to your car’s interior by replacing its generic shift knob with this Spider-Man inspired knob. This easy to install shift knob provides solid grip and comes shaped like Spidey’s iconic head, making it the ultimate car accessory for comic book enthusiasts.

Wave goodbye to broken heels by placing the high heel protectors on your designer stilettos before heading out. These discreet and reusable heel protectors fit easily over the heel of the stiletto to ensure they remain structurally intact while strutting around town.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Beer Pong Set
content: Turn a routine night of binge drinking into an epic alcohol chugging affair by playing with the glow in the dark beer pong set. The cups, balls, and table all feature a blindingly bright neon border that makes them glow for a clever way to play at night.

Be prepared for anything the rat race throws at you by keeping your piece handy with the under desk gun holster. The tough synthetic plate features an elastic holster able to accommodate virtually any type of handgun so it’s always there when you need it.

Fill your children’s carefree days with pure joy using the giant bubble wands. Once the wands are dipped into the included solution, your kids will have the time of their lives creating ginormous bubbles big enough for them to fit inside of.

Give your plain outfit a touch of brilliance by accessorizing with the LED heart necklace. This lovely battery operated pendant glows in a stunning blue shade, making it an ideal accessory for concerts, bars, and parties.

Get up close and personal to the car of your dreams by assembling this LEGO Lamborghini Gallardo. This pint sized Lambo captures the essence of the iconic Italian sports car perfectly – from the bright yellow paintjob to the signature rims and emblem.

Accelerate your quest to find Mr. Right by showing up to the local watering hole wearing the hypnotizing light up bra. This jaw-dropping garment provides a comfortable fit while providing everyone else with an eye-catching view of your mammary studded light show.

Keep every important appliance in your life close at hand by placing them inside the bedside caddy. This functional caddy can be mounted on all types of furniture and features enough space to neatly store laptops, TV remotes, phones, and books.

Blow your kid’s college fund on an exciting new technology that is bound to cost 1/10th the price 6 months from now with the curved 4K Ultra HD LED TV. After all, who needs an education that lasts a lifetime when you can watch HD programming all day long?

Give every meal a soupçon of patriotism when you prepare them on the USA shaped cutting board. While the novelty shape of this bamboo cutting board provides a great workstation, it also makes it an ideal serving platter when freedom loving guests come over.

Build the panty dropping chest, guns, and back muscles you’ve always dreamed off by working out with the push up training system. The specially color coded wooden board helps you keep proper form as you sculpt your body like Michelangelo.

Create an enchanting ambiance in any area of your home with the fairy ball lights. Once you string these small lights over the desired structure, they give off a soft, pastel glow that make them ideal decorations for any occasion.

titleEN: My Neighbor Totoro Cookie Cutter Set
content: Insert some life into your baked treats by molding them into the shape of Totoro! Using the My Neighbor Totoro cookie cutter set you can create 4″ and 2″ versions of Totoro that are as tasty as they are adorable. It’s the perfect snack for Totoro fans of all ages.

Become a rock god without having to deal with instructors by teaching yourself with the digital guitar. When you’re ready to rock out, the neck lights up to indicate the correct notes so you can easily learn the notes and practice proper fingering.

Bring a small token of Tolkien’s masterpiece to life with the purchase of the Hobbit Arkenstone replica. This handmade Arkenstone is made entirely from fine K9 crystal and is guarded by a small yet sturdy treasure chest decorated with Dwarvish runes.

Avoid unsightly clumps of uneven butter on your toast by using the heated butter knife. While the ergonomic handle remains cool, the blade warms up so that the butter slices off like uh, warm butter, while keeping your toast or waffle in perfect structural condition.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Jellyfish Paperweight
content: Give your eyes something to stare off into at work with the glow in the dark jellyfish paperweight. The compact size makes it ideal for placing on a crowded desk while the hypnotizing jellyfish floating inside the hand-blown glass captures your attention with its vivid colors.

Get serious about your underwater photography as you dive in for a session using the waterproof iPhone case. The minimalist design gives your phone an elegant appearance while providing easy access to all of the phone’s soon to be obsolete features.

Fill your room up with brilliant colors with the flick of a switch using the double rainbow maker. Once the sun energizes the solar panel, the unit begins to spin around while the two Swarovski crystals maximize  the colors for an incredible effect that’ll brighten any room.

Bust out a eardrum shattering solo whenever the mood strikes with the electronic drum machine shirt. This black cotton tee features a fully functional drum machine that lets you choose from nine different drum kits, allowing you to create your own drum loops.

Once the USB paper towel charger is introduced in your life you’ll wonder how you ever got along without it. With fully functional USB ports at the base and a sturdy anodized aluminum pole made to handle the quiltiest of rolls, there’s nothing this paper towel rack can’t do.

Amaze the audience with something other than your incredible playing with the light up drumsticks. These luminescent drumsticks are made to handle the rigors of banging on a trash can and create amazing visual displays the audience will go wild for.

Keep your phone fully charged while on the road by enlisting the services of the R2-D9 USB car charger. This little droid is just as helpful as its more famous cousin and fits snugly into the car’s cup holder as it charges your electronic device via USB.

Keep your files protected and organized as you deviously hop around from port to port by saving them in the condom USB drive. The USB is compatible with multiple platforms and features a risqué design that’s bound to attract attention wherever you go.

Revolutionize the way you listen to audio by playing it through the gravity defying Bluetooth speaker. While the orb enthralls the eyes as it mysteriously hovers in mid-air, the speaker delivers remarkably pristine OM/ONE audio with absolutely no external distortion.

Recreate epic galactic battles from the comfort of home with the Star Wars LEGO AT-AT Walker. Once its been fully assembled, the AT-AT stands over a foot tall and features a moving head with enough space in the cockpit for two LEGO Stormtroopers.

Place a new spin on the way you tell time with the swirling mercury watch. Instead of a standard analog display, the watch utilizes two brightly colored bands that continuously spin around to indicate the hour and minute in a simple and unique way.

Speed down the highway in true superhero fashion wearing the Iron Man motorcycle helmet. Both DOT and ECE certified, this stylish helmet provides maximum protection as it dazzles nearby drivers with the amazingly intricate Iron Man design.

Learn everything you’ve ever wanted to know about your favorite reptilian crime fighters by reading the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles history book. This fascinating book gives you an in-depth look into everything about these awesome mutant crime-fighters.

Pay homage to the Ricktator like a true fan with this Walking Dead Rick Grimes Statue. Crafted from durable resin, this 14″ statue captures Rick Grimes in all his glory by showcasing him kicking some zombie ass in stunning, gut-wrenching detail.

Stay warm and toasty by igniting a flame with the fire starting flint shoelaces. Ideal for hiking and outdoorsy type footwear, the tip of each shoelace comes capped in rubber and houses a small ferro rod to help you get a flame started.

Get a complete workout without having to purchase a multitude of equipment with the adjustable dumbbells. They allow you to adjust the weight anywhere from 10 to 90 pounds so that you can transform your noodle arms into bulging pythons with minimal equipment.

Give your laptop a technicolor makeover with the rainbow light up keyboard. This colorful cover slips right over the keyboard and creates a glowing rainbow aura while the ergonomic and non-slip design makes it ideal for gaming.

Relieve the fun and excitement of your favorite underwater 3D adventure with the Finding Nemo pool toys. Nemo and his radical little turtle buddy have journeyed from the land down under to hang out and splash around in your pool.

Show off your violent passion for firearms at your next formal affair with the bullet cuff links. Made from recycled bullets, each cuff link is polished to a beautiful shine and features a contrasting fired primer for a dramatic effect that’ll make your suit pop.

Spread the love throughout your home with the heart shaped mirror. This unique mirror comes shaped like a heart along with three smaller mirror shaped hearts you can place nearby to create an eye-catching decoration in any area of your home.

Keep your kitchen utensils organized and always at hand with the LEGO block chef set. The geeky design takes a cue from your favorite construction toy to create a fun and extremely functional tool that’ll facilitate your meal preparation.

Bring back an awesome piece of 80s fashion to the present day with the stylish Top Gun pilot’s watch. This Swiss made timepiece sports a rugged army green band and features a scratch resistant analog face that displays time, date, and altitude.

Make your kicks pop when you lace them up with the green light up shoelaces. These luminescent laces easily thread through any sneaker, require no tying, and features three modes of operation so you can customize them to your liking.

Start perfecting your slow-mo run run when you hit the beach in the bae watch swimsuit. Reminiscent of the iconic one-piece bathing suits from Bay Watch, this updated version features the same eye-catching red fabric and design that made them so memorable.

Keep your buzz going strong throughout the day by self medicating profusely with the Jello shot syringe kit. Once the medicine is prepared for consumption, the sweet concoction is to be enjoyed orally every 15 minutes or as needed for maximum inebriation.

Flaunt your excessive wealth on game night when you play with the 24K gold playing cards. Certified 99.9% pure 24K gold foil plated, this lavish deck is handcrafted with utmost attention to detail and features a $100 dollar bill design on the reverse side.

Transport valuables without attracting unwanted attention by storing them in the Hawaiian Punch stash can. While the exterior is indistinguishable from a regular can of delicious Hawaiian Punch, the hollowed-out interior serves as the ideal stash spot.

Get cozy with your sweetie as you cool off on the floating loveseat. This large bean bag styled pool accessory features a sturdy weather and fade resistant exterior and includes built-in straps so you to hook it onto another float or position it as a loveseat.

Give your feline friend a fortified base of operations with the cardboard tank cat playhouse. This fully colored tank is remarkably easy to assemble and makes for a cozy and compact nook for your kitty cat to hang out in while plotting his next move.

Join your favorite Jedi on his harrowing subsequent quest to relinquish the galaxy of evil in Shakespeare’s The Jedi Doth Return. We return to the star-crossed galaxy far, far away to enjoy our beloved warriors and jesting droids soliloquize in perfect iambic pentameter.

Give your home’s entrance a regal appearance as guests are greeted by the Oberon brass door knocker. This 22″ brass door knocker displays Oberon – king of the fairies – cast in brass, with a sizable knocker piercing his cheeks.

Bring all your favorite Springfielders from the TV to your living room with the LEGO Simpsons minifigures. Now you’ll be able to recreate your own Springfield and hang out with everyone from titans of industry like Mr. Burns to certified C-list celebrities such as Bumbleebee Man.

Break the concentration of every other bowler at the alley when you knock down strike after strike with the eyeball bowling ball. This custom ball meets regulation size and weight standards and features an eye-catching and realistic depiction of a human eye.

Kick the party into high gear by blasting the good vibes all around using the sound system docking station. With features like acoustically tuned coaxial drivers and wOOx technology for  bumpin’ bass with little distortion, it will guarantee a crisp sound.

Count on the Unplugged Games book to keep your family entertained when the electricity goes out and civilization grinds to a halt. With over 50 fun-filled games that require no external batteries, it’ll force your kids to interact face to face.

Terrorize the good citizens of LEGO Town with the full brunt of the Empire by commissioning the construction of the LEGO Death Star. Once built, this intricate structure boasts an incredible array of characters, sets and moving parts that provide hours of fun.

If MacGyver had a vagina, he/she would undoubtedly own one of these hairclip multi-tools. Traditionally used by alpha females to mark their territory in their spouse’s domicile, this hair clip functions as a screwdriver, wrench, ruler and even a cutting edge!

Immortalize your favorite bounty hunter in more ways than one with the Boba Fett quotes mosaic. This stylish art piece comes with an elegant built-in frame and displays a mosaic of the dreaded Boba Fett, made entirely from his limited set of lines.

Make breakfast time with the sweetie a little more special by sharing drinks out of the heart shaped coffee mugs. Shaped like two curvy matching hearts, the ceramic mugs interlock perfectly when placed side by side – like you and your significant other.

Relive your best and worst memories as you pass the time doodling in the Coloring Book For College Kids. Illustrated with artwork that resemble a children’s activity book, it offers a humorous look at the trials and tribulations of modern college experiences.

Avoid computer related injuries like carpal tunnel with the ultra portable laptop stand. Despite its small and simplistic design, it’s built to handle different sized models and places the laptop at the ideal angle so you can work comfortably.

Turn your wallet into a miniature toolbox with the addition of the credit card sized multi tool. This completely flat wallet accessory conveniently houses 18 distinct and useful tools including bottle openers, screwdrivers, and box openers.

Enjoy an imported cold brew without ruining the cap for your collection by popping it open using the one handed beer bottle opener. The sturdy design caters perfectly for ambidextrous use and features a handy built-in magnet that keeps the cap from falling.

Embrace the dark side and experience its unmatched comfort by plopping down on the Darth Vader upholstered chair. With every inch covered in a durable black fabric and a back piece cleverly shaped like Vader’s head, it’s a must have for any Dark Jedi.

Put the treat in company retreat when you entertain everyone there with a brilliant light show courtesy of the sound activated light up tie. This brilliant garment, features an elegant blue diamond pattern that brilliantly lights up to the beat of the music.

Whip up delicious frozen treats everyone will rave over with the homemade ice cream maker. After you load up this 50s-styled appliance with your chosen ingredients, just sit back and enjoy as the machine prepares two pints of different flavors simultaneously.

Get enhanced visibility of the burgers in the dead of night with the trusty flashlight grilling spatula. A bright LED flashlight comes incorporated into the stainless steel spatula so that you can turn it on and off with a single hand.

Get your unborn child accustomed to the voices that’ll be nagging him for the rest of his live using the baby speaker system. The specially designed earbuds attach to the belly and will transmit both music and recordings of your choosing.

Turn your backyard pool into a mini water park the kids will never want to leave with the inflatable water slide. The slide can be placed almost anywhere along the edge of your pool in order to provide a new and fun way of cooling off.

Keep the young spores from having an unpleasant time in the dark by illuminating their room with the mushroom lights. These adorable lights emit low heat, have a long lifespan, and sport a cuteness factor that will make your kids forget their fears of the dark.

Create a life saving inferno in the midst of a torrential downpour with the waterproof fire starter tinder. It burns smokeless and ignites extraordinarily fast even in extremely unforgiving weather – to provide warmth and protection when you most need it.

Keep your sauce-drenched pasta from falling off by using the spaghetti fork to slurp it down. Available in two sizes, each specially designed fork features four nodes along the outer tines that help you twirl long and messy pasta like a pro without the use of a spoon.

Take a break from your newfangled high tech games and reminisce on the good old days with the analog games iPhone case. If you fancy yourself a old school gamer, this extraordinarily unique entertaining case is a must have.

Keep your headphones from becoming a cluster of knots in your pocket or purse using the earbuds tethering necklace. This useful necklace features a colorful appearance and keeps your earbuds nice and untangled, so they’re always at hand.

Make your dentist really earn his paycheck at your yearly check-up by whipping up some pinata cakes. With the pinata cake pan, you can create unique sugar-packed treats containing a frosty exterior and an even sweeter interior everyone will love – except your dentist.

Breathe a little life into your room’s drab decor by upgrading your pad with the aquarium night stand table. The night stand provides ample room for your things and will have your fishies at the height of luxury as they swim around this tempered glass night stand
